meanings.definition: A type of crustacean with a flattened body and seven pairs of legs.
meanings.sent1: The isopod scuttled along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: I found an isopod under a rock at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The isopod wore tiny sunglasses and a hat for a day at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The isopod moved as gracefully as a ballerina on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent5: The isopod's seven pairs of legs made it look like a tiny centipede.

meanings.definition: Any member of the order Isopoda, including woodlice and pill bugs.
meanings.sent1: We observed an isopod crawling slowly in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Isopods are fascinating creatures to study in biology class.
meanings.sent3: The isopod threw a tiny party for all the other bugs in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The isopod community worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The isopod's presence in the garden brought a sense of harmony among the insects.
